text: Debrecen is a city in Hajd√∫-Bihar, Northern Great Plain, Hungary. It is Hungary's second largest city by population, after the capital, Budapest. == Twin Towns == * Cattolica, Emilia-Romagna * Jyvaskyla, Western Finland * Klaipeda, Klaipeda County * Lublin, Lublin Voivodeship * New Brunswick, New Jersey * Oradea, Bihor County * Paderborn, North-Rhine-Westphalia * Rishon LeZion, Center District * Setubal, Lisboa region * Saint Petersburg, Northwestern Federal District * Shumen, Shumen Province * Syktyvkar, Komi Republic * Taitung City, Taitung County Category:Cities in Hungary
title: Debrecen
